title: If you could give “truth serum” to anyone you want, who would you give it to? - Quora

response.answer_text: I knew the answer to this in a split-second. I’d give it to my little brother. Now, lets assume that the serum will last 1 hour. I get my parents, give the serum to my little brother, and get him to confess all the stupid, annoying, and bad stuff that he did to me on purpose and all the rules he broke that ended up getting me in trouble because he didn’t want the punishment and I couldn’t defend myself. If you are wondering why I would give it to my brother to make him confess this stuff, he lies constantly to give others punishments for what he did. On top of that, he will break rules, ignore common sense, and completely disrespect and ignore others to get what he wants. Especially if it gets him out of trouble scratch-free. His thought is “Eye for an Eye, but if I did it first you can’t do it to me”. On top of that, my parents don’t let me speak to defend myself. I really hope my dad sees this and shares it with my mom, as apparently the only wrong my brother does in their eyes would be stuff that could hurt or kill someone. I’m sick of his lying BS and getting into trouble because of him.
